ProjectTitle: Mapping the plant-phage-bacterium interaction and impact of viral communities on plant health
InitialFeedbackHistory:
02/06/2023
Data: Please also list the samples that you will use, these are physical data, do these need special management such as storage under specific conditions? 
Metadata: Will you generate metadata with your experiments? For sequencing MIxS or MINSEQE is often used, and for microscopy OME, ask the core facility what they provide, for more information: www.kuleuven.be/rdm/en/guidance/documentation-metadata
Preservation: Storing data on external hard disks is not very secure, consult the storage guide to find a suitable alternative: https://icts.kuleuven.be/storagewijzer/en.
label: good with suggestions
